title: Himi 96
lyrics:
7’s & 6’s
1.
Ko e ongonoa au,
Pea mo e vale;
Ko hono nunu’a pē
‘O e angahala;
Ka ‘i he lingi hifo,
Ho laumālie lelei;
Pea u loto ongo ai,
‘I ho’o anga’ofa.
2.
Pea u fakatomala,
Pea loto molū;
Pea u loto tokanga’i,
Ki hoku ‘Otua.
Pea u feinga lahi
Pea u hoko ‘o tui
‘Aki hoku loto ni,
Pea u mo’ui ai.
3.
Pea u fanau’i fo’ou,
‘I ho Laumālie;
Pea u hoko ‘o ‘ilo,
‘A e loto ma’a;
‘I ho’o Folofola mai,
Ke ngata ‘a e tau ni;
Pea u toki lava’i,
‘I ho’o ‘ofa mai.
4.
’Eiki ko e me’a ni,
‘Oku ou holi ai
‘Ave hono mālohi
‘O e angakovi;
Mo ke fakapito au,
‘I ho’ mā’oni’oni;
Pea u lava’i koe,
‘I ho’o ‘ofa mai. *
